alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Ector (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 8:20PM CDT until June 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ECTOR AND SOUTHEASTERN ANDREWS COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goldsmith, or 20 miles west of Odessa, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Goldsmith, West Odessa, Odessa Schlemeyer Field and Notrees. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 117 and 119. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
